Uses of Interface
net.jodah.failsafe.function.AsyncRunnable

  • Packages that use AsyncRunnable 
    Package Description
    net.jodah.failsafe
    Core Failsafe APIs for performing failsafe executions.

    • Uses of AsyncRunnable in net.jodah.failsafe

      Methods in net.jodah.failsafe with parameters of type AsyncRunnable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CompletableFuture<Void> FailsafeExecutor.runAsyncExecution(AsyncRunnable runnable)
      Executes the runnable asynchronously until successful or until the configured policies are exceeded.
